title: 10 Saucy Slow Cooker Sandwiches
description: These 10 top-rated slow cooker sandwich recipes are just what you need to make your own Sloppy Joes, Gyros, and tacos at home.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 10 Saucy Slow Cooker Sandwiches By Vicky McDonald Vicky McDonald Vicky McDonald is a Seattle-based editor with over 15 years of experience in the media industry. She currently works as an editor for ParentMap.com. Prior to that, she was a senior content manager at Allrecipes. She loves baking, developing new recipes, and growing vegetables. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on April 1, 2017 Close Saucy slow cooker sandwich recipes There's nothing quite like a hot, messy sandwich — whether it's a gyro or a Sloppy Joe. What makes these kind of sandwiches so satisfying is that sumptuous slow cooker meat filling. These 10 top-rated recipes are just what you need to make your own juicy, slow cooker meat sandwiches at home. Every recipe can be prepped in less than 15 minutes, and makes multiple delicious sammies. 1. Zesty Slow Cooker Chicken BBQ This phenomenally popular BBQ chicken has been made by over 7,000 of our home cooks, and they love it. Photo by Creative Side of Me. 2. Slow Cooker Sausage with Sauce It takes just 5 ingredients, and 5 minutes of prep to make this sausage sandwich filler. Add a hoagie and some cheese for the ultimate, tummy-pleasing sandwich. Photo by Melissa Goff. 3. Sloppy Joe Mamas This kid favorite is comfort food at its best. Relive your childhood with this wonderful Sloppy Joe. Photo by lutzflcat. 4. Slow Cooker Italian Beef for Sandwiches Serve this juicy Italian beef with roasted peppers and some crusty ciabatta bread. Photo by cookinmama. 5. Slow Cooker Buffalo Chicken Sandwiches Forget messy buffalo wings, and enjoy a buffalo chicken sandwich instead. This recipe is great for a crowd. Photo by Soup Loving Nicole. 6. Slow Cooker Texas Pulled Pork Sweet and smoky with a touch of heat — this pulled pork is a solid favorite for our peeps. Photo by TTV78. 7. BBQ Pork for Sandwiches This three ingredient recipe is a 5-star winner all the way. Photo by cookinbug. 8. Pepperoncini Beef Love gyro sandwiches? Make them at home with this easy peasy pepperoncini beef. 9. Slow Cooker Cilantro Lime Chicken This zingy shredded chicken is divine in soft tortilla wrap. Photo by CountryGirlGourmet. 10. Easy Slow Cooker French Dip The secret ingredient in this recipe is a can of beer, and it makes all the difference. Photo by DawnF. Explore more: Recipes Everyday Cooking Slow Cooker Main Dishes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
